TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit GenerateApplicationManifest extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GenerateManifestBase
Public NotInheritable Class GenerateApplicationManifest Inherits GenerateManifestBase

summary.span: 生成 ClickOnce 项目的应用程序清单。

span.span: Generates an application manifest for ClickOnce projects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `EntryPoint`是一个可选 `[]` 参数，指示生成的清单程序集的入口点。`EntryPoint` is an optional `[]` parameter that indicates the entry point for the generated manifest assembly. 对于 ClickOnce 部署清单，此输入指定了 ClickOnce 应用程序清单。For a ClickOnce deployment manifest, this input specifies the ClickOnce application manifest. 在 Visual Studio 2005 中， [GenerateApplicationManifest 任务](/visualstudio/msbuild/generateapplicationmanifest-task) 需要 `EntryPoint` 在生成应用程序清单时使用。In Visual Studio 2005, the [GenerateApplicationManifest Task](/visualstudio/msbuild/generateapplicationmanifest-task) requires an `EntryPoint` when an application manifest is generated. (程序集或本机清单不需要 `EntryPoint` 。 ) 此要求由生成错误 "MSB3185：未指定清单的入口点" 强制执行。(Assembly or native manifests do not require an `EntryPoint`.) This requirement is enforced by the build error "MSB3185: EntryPoint not specified for manifest." 在 Visual Studio 2008 中，当 `EntryPoint` 未指定任务参数时，MSBuild 不会发出此错误。In Visual Studio 2008, MSBuild does not issue this error when the `EntryPoint` task parameter is not specified. 相反，此 \ 标记将插入为标记的子元素， \ 例如，如下所示。Instead, the \ tag is inserted as a child of the \ tag, for example, as follows. ```xml ``` 通过执行以下步骤，可将 DDL 依赖项添加到应用程序清单：You can add DLL dependencies to the application manifest by using the following steps: 1. 使用对的调用解析程序集中的引用 。Resolve the references in the assembly by using a call to . 2. 将上一个任务的输出和程序集本身传递给 。Pass the output of the previous task and the assembly itself to . 3. 使用 `Dependencies` 参数将依赖项传递给 。Pass the dependencies by using the `Dependencies` parameter to .

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序需要的公共语言运行时 (CLR) 的最低版本。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum version of the Common Language Runtime (CLR) required by the application.

value.span: 应用程序需要的 CLR 的最低版本。

span.span: The minimum version of the CLR required by the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，该值是生成系统使用的 CLR 版本。By default, the value is the CLR version in use by the build system. 如果任务正在生成本机清单，将忽略此属性。If the task is generating a native manifest, this property is ignored.

span.span: The task item that contains the application configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果任务正在生成本机清单，将忽略此属性。If the task is generating a native manifest, this property is ignored.

summary.span: 获取或设置为生成的清单定义依赖程序集集合的项列表。

span.span: Gets or sets an item list that defines the set of dependent assemblies for the generated manifest.

value.span: 依赖程序集名称的项列表。

span.span: An item list of dependent assembly names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每一项都可以由项元数据进一步描述，以指示其他部署状态和依赖关系的类型。Each item may be further described by item metadata to indicate additional deployment state and the kind of dependence.

summary.span: 获取或设置在 ClickOnce 安装期间对话框中显示的网页的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of the Web page that is displayed in dialog boxes during ClickOnce installations.

value.span: 一个字符串值，表示网页的 URL。

span.span: A string value that represents the URL of a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定在 ClickOnce 安装期间显示的对话框中要显示的网页。Specifies a Web page to be displayed in dialog boxes that are displayed during ClickOnce installations.

summary.span: 获取或设置与 ClickOnce 部署清单关联的一个或多个文件类型的列表。

span.span: Gets or sets a list of one or more file type that are associated with the ClickOnce deployment manifest.

summary.span: 文件关联只在面向 .NET Framework 3.5 或更高版本时才有效。

span.span: File associations only valid only when .NET Framework 3.5 or later is targeted.

value.span: 与所生成清单关联的文件类型的列表。

span.span: A list of file types that are associated with the generated manifest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文件类型可以是自定义的。File types can be custom. 下面是[ \ (ClickOnce 应用程序) 元素](/visualstudio/deployment/fileassociation-element-clickonce-application)的一个示例：The following is an example of a [\ Element (ClickOnce Application)](/visualstudio/deployment/fileassociation-element-clickonce-application): ```xml NewYorkTimes.Document nyt.ico New York Times Reader document ```

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序是否承载于在浏览器中（与 WPF Web 浏览器应用程序一样）。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the application is hosted in a browser (as are WPF Web Browser Applications).

value.span: 一个布尔值，指示是否在浏览器中承载要部署的应用程序。如果是，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the application being deployed will be hosted in a browser (), or not ().

value.span: 值仅适用于 WPF Web 浏览器应用程序。

span.span: only applies to WPF Web Browser Applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于除 WPF Web 浏览器应用程序以外的项目类型，将设置 为 `false` (默认值) 。For project types other than WPF Web Browser Applications, set to `false` (the default value). 部署 WPF Web 浏览器应用程序时，必须将属性设置 为 `true` 。When you deploy a WPF Web Browser Application, you must set the property to `true`. 这会导致将 `` 标记添加到生成的应用程序清单，使 ClickOnce 能够为包含 xbap 文件的浏览器承载的应用程序部署项目。This causes the `` tag to be added to the generated application manifest, enabling ClickOnce to deploy projects for browser-hosted applications, which contain .xbap files. 还必须通过将设置为来使应用程序联机 `false` 。You also have to make the application available online only by setting to `false`. 如果不满足此条件，您将收到 [MSBuild 错误 MSB3116](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/bb383983(v=vs.140))。If this condition is not met, you will receive [MSBuild Error MSB3116](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/bb383983(v=vs.140)).

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序的图标文件。

span.span: Gets or sets the application's icon file.

value.span: 要用于应用程序的图标文件。

span.span: The icon file to use for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序图标在生成的应用程序清单中表示，在 " **开始** " 菜单和 " **卸载或更改程序** " 对话框中使用。The application icon is expressed in the generated application manifest and is used on the **Start** menu and in the **Uninstall or change a program** dialog box. 如果未指定此输入，将使用默认图标。If this input is not specified, a default icon is used. 如果任务正在生成本机清单，将忽略此属性。If the task is generating a native manifest, this property is ignored.

summary.span: 获取或设置要在生成清单中隔离的 COM 组件。

span.span: Gets or sets COM components to isolate in the generated manifest.

value.span: 要在生成清单中隔离的 COM 组件。

span.span: The COM components to isolate in the generated manifest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可让你隔离用于 "注册免费 COM" 部署的 COM 组件。This property lets you isolate COM components for "Registration Free COM" deployment. 它的工作方式是自动生成具有标准 COM 注册定义的清单。It works by auto-generating a manifest that has standard COM registration definitions. 必须在生成计算机上注册 COM 组件。The COM components must be registered on the build computer.

summary.span: 获取或设置要生成的清单类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of manifest to generate.

value.span: 要生成的清单类型。

span.span: The kind of manifest to generate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以有下列值：This property can have the following values: - `Native` - `ClickOnce` 如果未指定此属性，任务默认为 `ClickOnce` 。If this property is not specified, the task defaults to `ClickOnce`.

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序所要求的操作系统 (OS) 的最低版本。

span.span: Gets or sets the operating system (OS) version that is the minimum required by the application.

value.span: 应用程序所要求的操作系统的最低版本。

span.span: The OS version that is the minimum required by the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，值 "5.1.2600.0" 表示操作系统为 Windows XP。For example, the value "5.1.2600.0" indicates that the operating system is Windows XP. 如果未指定此属性，则使用值 "4.10.0.0"。If this property is not specified, the value "4.10.0.0" is used. 这表明 Windows 98 秒版本，这是 .NET Framework 支持的最低操作系统版本。This indicates Windows 98 Second Edition, which is the minimum supported operating system for the .NET Framework. 如果任务正在生成本机清单，将忽略此输入。If the task is generating a native manifest, this input is ignored.

summary.span: 指定项目文件中的 ProductName 属性。

span.span: Specifies the ProductName property in the project file.

value.span: 与项目文件中的 ProductName 属性相对应的字符串值。

span.span: A string value that corresponds to the ProductName property in the project file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与 `ProductName` 项目文件中的属性相对应。This property corresponds to the `ProductName` property in the project file. 默认值是 `null`。The default value is `null`. 如果 `ProductName` 为 null 并且 为 `true` ，则注册表中的 RegisteredOrganization 值将写入到应用程序清单中。If `ProductName` is null and is `true`, the RegisteredOrganization value in the registry is written to the application manifest. 如果 RegisteredOrganization 也为 null，则使用程序集名称。If RegisteredOrganization is also null, the assembly name is used.

summary.span: 指定项目文件中的 PublisherName 属性。

span.span: Specifies the PublisherName property in the project file.

value.span: 与项目文件中的 PublisherName 属性相对应的字符串值。

span.span: A string value that corresponds to the PublisherName property in the project file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与 `PublisherName` 项目文件中的属性相对应。This property corresponds to the `PublisherName` property in the project file. 默认值是 `null`。The default value is `null`. 如果 `PublisherName` 为 null 并且 为 `true` ，则将程序集名称写入应用程序清单。If `PublisherName` is null and is `true`, the assembly name is written to the application manifest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与 `SupportUrl` 项目文件中的属性相对应。This property corresponds to the `SupportUrl` property in the project file. 默认值为 **null**。The default value is **null**. 如果 `SupportUrl` 为 null 并且 为 `true` ，则向应用程序清单写入一个空字符串。If `SupportUrl` is null and is `true`, an empty string is written to the application manifest.

summary.span: 获取或设置指定应用程序安全性的 XML 文档。

span.span: Gets or sets an XML document that specifies the application security.

value.span: 指定应用程序安全性的 XML 文档。

span.span: The XML document that specifies the application security.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 文档中的根元素必须是 trustInfo 命名空间中的一个节点。The root element in the XML document must be a trustInfo node in the asm.v2 namespace. 如果任务正在生成本机清单，将忽略此属性。If the task is generating a native manifest, this property is ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 、 和 属性默认为 `null` 。The , , and properties default to `null`. 仅当为时，才使用这些属性 `true` ，如果是，则将这些属性的值写入应用程序清单中的相应标记。These properties are only used if is `true`; if so, the values of these properties are written to the corresponding tags in the application manifest. 如果 `false` (默认值) ，则将忽略这些属性。If is `false` (the default value), these properties are ignored.
